mapper.select: SELECT poi.id, poi.purchase_order_id as purchaseOrderId, poi.spare_part_id as sparePartId, poi.quantity, poi.unit_price as unitPrice, poi.received_quantity as receivedQuantity, poi.remark, sp.code as sparePartCode, sp.name as sparePartName FROM purchase_order_item poi LEFT JOIN spare_part sp ON poi.spare_part_id = sp.id WHERE poi.purchase_order_id = #{purchaseOrderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase_order_item (purchase_order_id, spare_part_id, quantity, unit_price) VALUES (#{purchaseOrderId}, #{sparePartId}, #{quantity}, #{unitPrice})
